jd: Hi Professionals, This is Arun from GAC solutions Inc. I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent requirement your prompt response is appreciated .Net Full Stack Developer Location: Fort Mill, SC – OnsiteContract Angular+.Net Specialist Designer+Developer H1B Consultants Only$ 55.00/hr on C2C • 8-12 years' experience with hands on full stack application development using Angular, .Net, C#, REST API, JSON forms, relational and non-relational databases following test-driven development (TDD) approach.• Design and develop scalable enterprise applications with expertise in full stack development in AWS cloud or on-prem environment.• Deep understanding and seasoned on Web UI development using Container frameworks• Develop end to end design for the platform, solution delivery and execution and code quality.• Collaborate with peer teams, technology platform owner, product manager/owner, enterprise architecture and platform support teams to ensure delivery of production into Production.• Working on Agile projects with CI/CD• Work collaboratively with quality assurance engineer teams, DevOps to ensure all SDLC processes are adhered to.• Assess opportunities for platform/application and process improvements.• Maintain, troubleshoot, optimize and enhance existing systems.• Communicate effectively with cross-functional stakeholders and application integration partners.• Hands-on knowledge of Camunda BPM platform is a plus.
